name: Stickman Bike Battle
description:
Grab your bike and join the ultimate Stickman Bike Battle multiplayer experience. Battle against bikers around the world in 1vs1 matches in astonishing, beautiful, hand crafted bike levels. Race down lonely mountains trying to beat your opponent to win coins to get new and better bikes and characters. 1vs1 races, boss battles, gang battles and many bonus levels are just few of the awesome features waiting for you right now.

GAME MODES:
• 1vs1 Race Battle
• Stars Challenge Bonus Levels
• Trials Challenge Bonus Levels
• 4 Bike Gang Battles
• Boss Battles
• Training mode. Train you skills whenever you want
• Tutorial. Learn the basics
• Offline mode. You can play even in offline mode

CONTENT
• 30 levels in different terrains: mountain, snow, beach. More coming soon…
• 24 different skilled characters including Stickman, Spaceman, Beach Girl, Skeleton, Ghost and many more
• 20 awesome bikes with different abilities: BMX, Hardtail, Fully, …
• Leaderboards per rank, daily and weekly
• Full controller support

Check out the video trailer : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5EA2plXyyIo

Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible

Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!
